entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry is introduced as a person who has a wand and recognizes it when Mr. Diggory brandishes it.

entities.name: mr. diggory
entities.description: Mr. Diggory is introduced as a person who finds Harry with a wand in his hand and recognizes the wand.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is introduced as a person who intervenes on behalf of Harry, defending him against Mr. Diggory's accusations.

relationships.description: Mr. Diggory accuses Harry of conjuring the Dark Mark, as evidenced by Mr. Diggory's incredulous tone and questions.
Mr. Weasley defends Harry against Mr. Diggory's accusations, as evidenced by his angry tone and words of support for Harry.
Harry claims ownership of the wand that Mr. Diggory is holding, as evidenced by his statement 'That's my wand!'
